text: There is a bug inpublic ImageBrowseView Load(ImageBrowseInputModel input)the filtering should happen before the paging. This might actually be a bug in ravens linq support if the order did not matter for your tests.
Really - you think?All paging is doing is setting a value in the underlying state, when that gets done is largely irrelevant?
If you page before filtering you can get less than a page full of data back. Probably ravens linq support does not implement it that way! There are two bugs cancelling each other out.

hmm,  you are right - I am not sure if we'd count that as a bug as such, but it certainly does behave differently to default SQL linq provider or in memory collection provider.I shall start a discussion about it on the mailing list, I suspect we shall leave the behaviour as it is
